==Useful Info==
'''Azure jellies''' are some of the most dangerous jellies in the game, moving quickly and hitting very hard (they can deal 30-88 [[cold]] damage per turn on top of their physical damage). Although they lack the ability to corrode your equipment with [[acid]] like most jellies, their raw damage output makes them one of the most likely jellies to kill unprepared characters. They can be found in [[the Slime Pits]], [[Cocytus]], or near [[Jiyva]] [[altar]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Even without acid, they can consume [[door]]s, so don't expect to hide behind one when you meet azure jellies outside of [[the Slime Pits]].
*High [[AC]] and rC++ or better negates most of their ability to harm you. If you're lacking either, going into melee with them is going to hurt. Take them out at range, preferably with [[fire]] damage.
*Azure jellies are one of the possible creatures that can appear after [[the Royal Jelly]] takes damage. If you lack cold resistance, these should absolutely be your highest priority... unless you also lack acid resistance, in which case you probably shouldn't be there at all.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], azure jellies had [[electricity resistance]].
